data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 18,644 believers in the state of Phú Yên to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phú Yên, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Phú Yên words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Phú Yên to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Phú Yên, Vietnam to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bih people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Phú Yên to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Phú Yên to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Phú Yên.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

location.name: Phú Yên
location.cities_list: Sông Cầu, Tuy Hòa, Đồng Xuân, Hai Riêng, Củng Sơn
location.cities_list_w_pop: Sông Cầu (94,066), Tuy Hòa (69,596), Đồng Xuân, Hai Riêng, Củng Sơn
